comments.raw_text:
We need to create a retirement blog post for firefoxfestival.com for the Mozilla Website Archive at:
http://blog.mozilla.com/website-archive/

Blog post should include:
* The dates this site was existence
* The purpose of the site
* What the site accomplished
* A screenshot
* Any relevant links that the reader should follow.
